description: When one call is setup ,cleard or determined , the trap
is sent to NMS

event.Summary: One call is setup, cleared or determined

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCall A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnIf i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnAddr s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallType i 0 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallerAddr s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnInfoType i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnLastKeepTime i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallFreeReason s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallFreeCode i 9999

description: this object is used to describe the virtual
interface value associated with one neighbor.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnIf

description: this object is used to descirbe the call address
by which we call one nieghbor.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnAddr

description: this object is used to describe that whether it is an
incoming call or an outging call.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallType

description: this object is used to describe the callser address
which will be known by B channels.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallerAddr

description: this object is used to describe the information type
on the call
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnInfoType

description: this object is used to describe the last call duration
time in milliseconds
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnLastKeepTime

description: this object is used to describe the reason why last
call is cleard
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallFreeReason

description: this object is used to describe the reason code for
the last call down.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwChanbIsdnCallFreeCode

description: This trap/inform is sent to the manager whenever a call
is established successfully.

Summary.eval: ($v4 == 1) ? 'Incoming call $v3 established successfully' : 'Outgoing call $v2 established successfully'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallSetup A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnOpIndex i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalled s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalling s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallDirection i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeOpen s EXAMPLEE

description: Index of the B ISDN channel interface managed by Q93
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnOpIndex

description: This object describes the called ISDN number.
When an outgoing call is established successfully, the
value of this node is the call number of this device
otherwise the value is null string
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalled

description: This object describes the calling ISDN number.
When an incoming call is established successfully, the
value of this node is the call number of peer device
otherwise the value is null string.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalling

description: This object describes the direction of the current call.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallDirection

description: This object describes the start time of this call.
start time is the time of an existent call that
has just been established.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeOpen

description: This trap/inform is sent to the manager under the following
conditions:
- an existent call is normally cleared.
- an existent call is determined to have ultimately
failed, and has been cleared.
- the existent call is cleared when the BRI/PRI port is
down.
- the existent call is cleared when the dialer rule is
down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallClear A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnOpIndex i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalled s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalling s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCauseDisc i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallDirection i 1 A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeOpen s EXAMPLEE A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeClose s EXAMPLEE

description: Index of the B ISDN channel interface managed by Q93
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnOpIndex

description: This object describes the called ISDN number.
When an outgoing call is established successfully, the
value of this node is the call number of this device
otherwise the value is null string
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalled

description: This object describes the calling ISDN number.
When an incoming call is established successfully, the
value of this node is the call number of peer device
otherwise the value is null string.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCalling

description: This object describes last cause of disconnection.
In hwQ931IsdnCallClear trap, the value of this node is
the reason of disconnection, this node is only valid
for hwQ931IsdnCallClear trap, the value of this node
is unknown in other situation.
unknown: unknown error.
normCallClr: normal call clearing.
noRouteToTransNet: no route to specified transit network.
noRouteToDest: no route to destination.
switchEquCongest: switching equipment congestion.
netOutofOrder: network out of order.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnLastCauseDisc

description: This object describes the direction of the current call.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallDirection

description: This object describes the start time of this call.
start time is the time of an existent call that
has just been established.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeOpen

description: This object describes the close time of this call.
This node is only vaild for hwQ931IsdnCallClear trap.
In other situation the value of this node is zero.
In hwQ931IsdnCallClear trap, this node provides the
time of an existent call that the call has just been
cleared.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwQ931IsdnCallTimeClose

description: This trap/inform is sent to the manager whenever the
D-channel of an interface changes state.
This object is used to describe the D channel
interface value associated with one neighbor.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwLapdIsdnIf

description: The operational status of this interface:
inactive all layers are inactive.
l1Active layer 1 is activated
layer 2 datalink not established.
l2Active layer 1 is activated
layer 2 datalink established.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-ISDN-MIB::hwLapdIsdnLinkStatus
